p: To verify the milling process producing corn root powder between Monsanto and BCIRL and the substitution of Viking seed for Monsanto proprietary seed, four diets were made incorporating different seed sources and seed varieties. Both Monsanto and BCIRL made root powder from both Monsanto proprietary seed and Viking seed. The four sources of root powder were compared for their support of larval performance (survival, weight, and molting). The proportions of corn root powder and remaining ingredients were the same as in WCRMO-1 diet ( Huynh et al. 2017).
